SEARCH
Package jdbc

Class JDBCMedicalHistory

java.lang.Object
jdbc.JDBCMedicalHistory
All Implemented Interfaces:
MedicalHistoryManager
public class JDBCMedicalHistory extends Object implements MedicalHistoryManager
Implementation of the MedicalHistoryManager interface using JDBC for managing persistence operations related to medical history records in the database. * This class handles creating, retrieving, and updating medical history entries, as well as managing the assignment of pending records to doctors based on signal type.

  • Method Details

    • addMedicalHistory

      public int addMedicalHistory(MedicalHistory m)
      Inserts a new medical history record into the 'medicalhistory' table. * @param m The MedicalHistory object to insert. It must contain the client ID, date, and observations. The doctor ID is optional.
      Specified by:
      addMedicalHistory in interface MedicalHistoryManager
      Parameters:
      m - The MedicalHistory object to add. Its ID should be updated upon successful insertion.
      Returns:
      The automatically generated record ID for the new medical history, or -1 if an error occurred.

    • getMedicalHistoryByClientId

      public List<MedicalHistory> getMedicalHistoryByClientId(int clientId)
      Retrieves all medical history records associated with a specific client ID. * @param clientId The ID of the client whose history records are to be retrieved.
      Specified by:
      getMedicalHistoryByClientId in interface MedicalHistoryManager
      Parameters:
      clientId - The ID of the client whose records are to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      A list of MedicalHistory objects for the given client. Returns an empty list if none are found.

    • addSymptoms

      public void addSymptoms(int recordId, List<String> symptomsList)
      Adds a list of symptoms to an existing medical history record.

      After successfully adding symptoms, this method assigns the default doctor (retrieved from JDBCDoctor.getDefaultDoctorId()) to the medical history record.

      * @param recordId The ID of the medical history record to update.
      Specified by:
      addSymptoms in interface MedicalHistoryManager
      Parameters:
      recordId - The ID of the medical history record to update.
      symptomsList - The list of symptoms (Strings) to add.

    • updateObservations

      public void updateObservations(int recordId, String observations)
      Updates the observations field for an existing medical history record. * @param recordId The ID of the medical history record to update.
      Specified by:
      updateObservations in interface MedicalHistoryManager
      Parameters:
      recordId - The ID of the medical history record to update.
      observations - The new observation text to set.

    • assignPendingRecordsToDoctor

      public void assignPendingRecordsToDoctor(int doctorId, DoctorSpecialty specialty)
      Assigns pending medical history records to a specific doctor based on the doctor's specialty and the type of signal (ECG or EMG) associated with the record. *

      A record is considered "pending" if its doctor_id is NULL.

      *
      • **CARDIOLOGIST:** Assigns records that have an 'ECG' signal.
      • **NEUROPHYSIOLOGIST:** Assigns records that have an 'EMG' signal.
      • **GENERAL_MEDICINE:** Assigns records that have NO signal attached (s.type IS NULL).
      * @param doctorId The ID of the doctor to assign the records to.
      Specified by:
      assignPendingRecordsToDoctor in interface MedicalHistoryManager
      Parameters:
      doctorId - The ID of the doctor to whom the records should be assigned.
      specialty - The specialty of the doctor, used to filter which pending records to assign.
